sentences.sContent: ‘Empowerment’ is the new buzz-word in enlightened management circles.
sentences.sCn: “授权”是开明的管理层所使用的时髦新语。

synos.tran: 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的

remMethod.val: 来自enlighten(v. 启发， 启蒙)

words.tran: 使人领悟的；有启发作用的
启发，启蒙；教导，开导；照耀

trans.tranCn: 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的
trans.tranOther: someone with enlightened attitudes has sensible modern views and treats people fairly and kindly
